jump_scares.spoiler: The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
Hank jumps at Abby from the side
After Hank says “you should get that thing off him before he floats away” there is a car horn blast and a cut to Hank firing a gun
As Abby is pulling the hammock there is a cut to Hank falling out of bed
The trap Hank set suddenly goes off
As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground
While Hank is singing, the monster suddenly lunges at him
Radek is suddenly pulled inside the door of the shack by an unseen creature
From a distance, we see the crocodile attempt to break out of the shack making a loud noise in the process
Lena and Dr. Ventress hear a rustling noise nearby
Sheppard is suddenly snatched away by a bear
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out

Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James

James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams

A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James

Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa

Wendy opens tent. Accompanied by sound effect
A quick jump-cut to a shot of the dead man’s face

A voice suddenly speak from the radio
A sound is heard in the distance
An unexpected sound is played
A man grabs Wendy’s leg

Accompanied by a loud sound, the shot abruptly changes to show an old lady in a bathtub

Abra suddenly opens her pupil-less, all white eyes
The shot abruptly changes to show Abra sitting on the edge of her bed, her eyes all white
Accompanied by a loud sound, a light suddenly turns on in a dark corridor
The shot abruptly changes to an axe going through a door accompanied by screams and noise
Clint looks down from the sky and sees the monster standing right behind Adam
Clint looks up to see Adam trapped in a cage of antlers

Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
